name: Personal Portfolio
description: Personal Portfolio is a modern website designed to showcase my experience, projects and skills. With a clean design and intuitive navigation, the site helps create a strong first impression with recruiters and collaborators.

name: CoinFusion
description: CoinFusion is an innovative platform designed to track and plan your cryptocurrency investments. With AI-powered features, CoinFusion helps you stay ahead in the market by providing personalized insights and trading strategies. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced trader, CoinFusion has something for you.

name: Lumina
description: Lumina is a next-generation social media platform designed to foster connections and interactions. With a sleek and modern interface, Lumina empowers users to share stories and stay connected with people. Lumina offers a seamless and engaging social experience.

name: Delizioso
description: Delizioso is a food content management system specializing in Italian cuisine. With a clean and user-friendly interface, Delizioso provides an exceptional experience for managing dishes and presenting them to users effectively.

name: YangTu
description: YangTu is a service platform that enables users to order home cleaning and shopping delivery services in a single app. Users can choose to be Jalu (service requester) or Yusa (task performer). This app provides flexibility and convenience for both parties, creating an efficient and user-friendly experience for daily needs.

name: GameVers
description: GameVers is a digital game store featuring the latest and most popular games. With a modern interface, GameVers provides the best experience for gamers to find their favorite games.
